standard_rule:
rule "Standard Credit Check":
if applicant.creditScore >= 750 and applicant.annualIncome >= 50000 then approve_application
actionset:
actionset "Risk Assessment Actions":
approve_application,
manual_review,
reject_application
complex_rule:
rule "Complex Risk Assessment":
if applicant.creditScore >= 700 and (applicant.annualIncome >= 75000 or applicant.existingCustomer = true) and transaction.amount <= account.creditLimit * 0.8 then approve_application
else if applicant.creditScore >= 650 and applicant.debtToIncome < 0.4 then manual_review
else reject_application
edge_case:
rule "Edge Case Rule":
if account.balance is_null or applicant.age < 18 then reject_application
else if transaction.amount in [100, 200, 300] then approve_application
